content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(6.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity pole at position (6.5, 0.5)
- Electricity pole at position (13.5, 10.5)
- Electricity pole at position (14.5, 9.5)
- Additional poles connecting to positions (13.5, 12.5), (10.5, 13.5), and (12.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 12
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6, Source: {'copper-ore': 5}
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20
- Chest at position (5.5, 0.5) - Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab at position(6, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (6, 0) - Status: NO_POWER, Research: automation

### Copper ore mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Nearest Copper Ore at position (-28.5, -61.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Nearest Iron Ore at position (-15.5, -50.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have all required ingredients before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory for necessary resources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that your lab and other electrical entities are connected to a power source to avoid issues with functionality.

### Errors related to no ingredients in furnaces
- Check the input inventory of furnaces to ensure they have the necessary ingredients to operate.
